item.title: CollapsibleSectionHolderImpl
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.UI.Controls public class CollapsibleSectionHolderImpl : IMPL_CALLBACKS, IDisposable Constructors CollapsibleSectionHolderImpl(ICollapsibleSectionHolder client) since 6.0 Properties IntPtr CppPointer since 6.0 Methods static ICollapsibleSectionHolder Find(IntPtr cpp) since 6.0 static ICollapsibleSectionHolder NewNativeWrapper(IntPtr cpp) since 6.0 void Dispose() since 6.0 bool IsSameObject(IntPtr cpp) since 6.0

item.title: CollapsibleSectionViewModel
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.UI.Controls Derive from this class to implement your own view model that wraps around a built in implementation of IRdkViewModel. Use GetData etc to implement your properties. public class CollapsibleSectionViewModel : IRdkViewModel Constructors CollapsibleSectionViewModel(ICollapsibleSection section) Construct from your section - the view model should be a member of the section since 6.0 Properties IntPtr CppPointer since 6.0 Methods void Commit(Guid uuidDataType) since 6.

item.title: FactoryBase
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.UI.Controls Base class for CollapsibleSection and ViewModel factories used by the RDK UI public class FactoryBase Methods static Type[] Register() Call this function during startup of current assembly to load classes with factory creation support are registed since 6.0 static Type[] Register(PlugIn plugin) Call this function during the startup of your plug-in to ensure that all classes that support factory creation are registed since 6.0 IntPtr Get(Guid id) Override this method to return a new instance of your class for the given ID since 6.
